metadata.synopsis: Aspiring country singer Dill Scallion (Billy Burke) scores a hit with a song called "You Shared You," based on his morally loose girlfriend, Tina (Kathy Griffin). Dill moves from small-town Texas to the bright lights of Nashville, Tenn., and takes up with local schemer Kristie Sue (Lauren Graham) and star producer Larry Steinberg (Henry Winkler). But his signature dance, the Scallion Shuffle, is a quirk that just might be an unwelcome wrinkle in Dill's rags-to-riches story.
